meanings.definition: A system of Japanese writing using characters derived from Chinese characters
meanings.sent1: In Japanese, kana helps to write words using special characters.
meanings.sent2: Learning kana is essential for understanding Japanese texts.
meanings.sent3: The kana characters had a party with the Chinese characters last night.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was like kana flowing gracefully on the page.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used kana to teach the students how to write their names.

meanings.definition: A syllabic script used in the Japanese writing system
meanings.sent1: Kana symbols represent syllables in Japanese writing.
meanings.sent2: Children in Japan start learning kana at a young age.
meanings.sent3: The kana script danced across the page in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: His speech was like a beautiful melody composed of kana sounds.
meanings.sent5: The book was filled with colorful kana characters that caught her eye.
